# Crypto challenges from aupCTF
- [Rotation](#rotation)
- [Ancient Cipher](#ancient-cipher)
- [Enigma](#enigma)
- [Disorder](#disorder)
- [RSA](#rsa)

- [Battista's Bet](#battistas-bet)

7/7 challenges 100% :)

-----

## Rotation

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/2c5dc3d0-cf96-4d10-b0fc-7f4598f7c16f)

It is just [ROT 47 with 67 as the amount then ROT 13 with 8 as amount](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=ROT47(67)ROT13(true,true,false,8)&input=MColcGdzOC5LKkg1SyojM0giTjo){:target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/5e77d548-da4f-40a2-ad2a-3cc0ae0014e4)

Flag: `aupCTF{y0u-f0und-m3}`

-----

## Ancient-Cipher

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/062a186e-5249-4763-a7c9-b18ca570bf95)

It is just [ROT 13 with 9 as amount](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=ROT13(true,true,false,9)&input=cmxnVEtXe1MwcydqX1NydV9UaXBnazB4aXJneXBfNWIxY2NqfQ){:target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/3dc722a1-193e-409f-8561-3d25d8a9a917)

Flag: `aupCTF{B0b's_Bad_Crypt0graphy_5k1lls}`

-----

## Enigma

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/21306b00-7601-4c11-ba86-8582595c48cc)

Use [Enigma machine decoder with the required settings](https://www.dcode.fr/enigma-machine-cipher){:target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/9869c0fe-2488-413e-961f-5a0d08c49f15)

Flag: `aupCTF{ENIGMAISFASCINATING}`

-----

## Disorder

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/31339616-dedf-4cb8-abf5-130579d42b07)

It was [Transposition Cipher](https://www.dcode.fr/transposition-cipher){:target="_blank" rel="noopener"}

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/6b87ca1e-db60-4e19-aade-8cede053e18a)

Flag: `aupCTF{th1s_1s_n0t_a_game}`

-----

## RSA

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/c8e1723a-0f1a-4a0a-9b38-68306172c2f2)

```py
n = 
e = 0x10001
c = 
p + q =  21400959789031198835597502268226110838410793429486235013163818172148759394109297013195530163943463063090162742198192075506990494863858727035693527345539878
p - q =  441620610348849769847261104024471204541391170160225757260110727514761526074769013762749528928112909396341014808517549368576708910310103233373547986477636
```

Since `(p+q) + (p-q) = 2p` dividing it by 2 gives p.

```py
p = 10921290199690024302722381686125291021476092299823230385211964449831760460092033013479139846435787986243251878503354812437783601887084415134533537666008757
```

Using an [RSA decoder](https://www.dcode.fr/rsa-cipher){:target="_blank" rel="noopener"} decoder to get flag.

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/12cb4526-2ed4-46e4-aa07-68123454a39c)

Flag: `aupCTF{3a5y_tw0_3quat10n5_and_hax3d_3}`

-----

## Swiss-Army-Knife

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/35b76a5d-4ad2-4b77-a0d1-d589d57ae11b)

I used [CyberChef](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=Find_/_Replace(%7B'option':'Regex','string':'X'%7D,'0',true,false,true,false)Find_/_Replace(%7B'option':'Regex','string':'Y'%7D,'1',true,false,true,false)From_Binary('Space',8)From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true,false)From_Morse_Code('Space','Line%20feed')From_Base32('A-Z2-7%3D',false)ROT13(true,true,false,7)&){:target="_blank" rel="noopener"} to do these:

```
XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXXXX XYYYXYXX XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXX
XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXXXX XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYXXYYY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY
XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYXXYYY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYXXYYY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXXXX XYYYXYXY
XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXXXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY
XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXX
XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYXXYYY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXXXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXXXX XYYYXYXY

XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYXXYYY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXX

XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXXXX XYYXXYYY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXXXX XYYXXYYY
XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXXXX XYYYXYXX XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXXXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXX
XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXX XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYXXYYY
XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXX XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXXXX XYYYXYXY
XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXXXX XYYXXYYY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXXXX XYYXXYYY XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY
XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXXXX XYYXXYYY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XXYYXXXX XYYYXYXY
XYXXYXXY XYXXXXYY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX
XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX
XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXYY XYXXXXXY XYYYXYXX
XYXXYYXX XYYXYXXY XXYYXYXX XYYYXYXY XYXXYYXX XYXYXXXY XXYYYYXY XXYYYYXY
```

I believed it was just `X` representing 0 and `Y` representing 1 then decode the binary.

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/d318bc41-b733-4335-bcb6-430d2a8a4e79)

Which produces a base64 encoded string: ``

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/9347cc96-7dc0-442e-944f-28d13344687a)

Produces a morse code: `--- .-. -..- --. ... ...- ... -. .-.. ..-. ..... .-- -- ...-- .-. .-. -. ...- .-. --. ... -- .--- - ..-. ..- --.. .-- --- ..... .-. --.- --- ....- -.-- .-- --- -.... .-. ...- ..-. ...- -..- -.. -.- -- ...-- -..- .--. ..- -...- -...- -...- -...- -...- -...-`

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/bb865a34-3433-4525-b231-8f72ec90ba15)

Produces a base32 encoded strings: `ORXGSVSNLF5WM3RRNVRGSMJTFUZWO5RQO4YWO6RVFVXDKM3XPU======`

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/a12cae7c-2cf6-46d6-8566-dc13718c7a66)

Produces a rot13 with amount 7: `tniVMY{fn1mbi13-3gv0w1gz5-n53w}`

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/5377c20f-5166-41e6-83d6-3afae88881e8)

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/38be5d88-0bba-4a0f-8a4e-eeb1279c1b09)

Flag: `aupCTF{mu1tip13-3nc0d1ng5-u53d}`

-----

## Battista's-Bet

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/23482e51-ec28-477d-969f-87e9641670ca)

Hint: The key to decode the message is a SECRET

This is just [Vigenere Cipher decode](https://www.dcode.fr/vigenere-cipher){:target="_blank" rel="noopener"} with SECRET as the key.

![image](https://github.com/jeromepalayoor/ctf-writeups/assets/63996033/76ef2c6c-dcf9-436a-9ba9-e923da4b8f1d)

Flag: `aupCTF{B3lla50W0uldB3Pr0ud}`
